item.name: Status of the Disk1
item.description: This variable indicates the present operational status of the disk.

valuemap.name: BlueCoat SG Operational Status Of The Disk

item.name: Status of the Disk2
item.description: This variable indicates the present operational status of the disk.

valuemap.name: BlueCoat SG Operational Status Of The Disk

item.name: Percent of CPU in use
item.description: Percent of CPU in use.

item.name: Percent of disk in use
item.description: Percent of disk in use.

item.name: Uptime
item.description: The amount of time the proxy has been running since boot, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median DNS service time 1
item.description: The median DNS service time, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median DNS service time 5
item.description: The median DNS service time, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median DNS service time 60
item.description: The median DNS service time, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average byte rate for all responses
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP responses, in bytes per second.

item.name: Average byte rate for all hits
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP hits, in bytes per second.

item.name: Average byte rate for all misses
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP misses, in bytes per second.

item.name: Average byte rate for all partial hits
item.description: The average byte rate for all HTTP partial hits, in bytes per second.

item.name: Percentage hit rate (by requested bytes)
item.description: The percentage HTTP hit rate (by requested bytes). This is the number of bytes returned to the client for hits, as a fraction of the total bytes.

item.name: Total number of connections with the proxy clients
item.description: The total number of HTTP connections with the proxy clients.

item.name: Number of active connections with the proxy clients
item.description: The number of active HTTP connections with the proxy clients.

item.name: Number of idle connections with the proxy clients
item.description: The number of idle HTTP connections with the proxy clients.

item.name: Number of errors caused by client connections
item.description: The number of HTTP errors caused by client connections.

item.name: Percentage hit rate (by objects)
item.description: The percentage HTTP hit rate (by objects).

item.name: Number of hits
item.description: The number of HTTP hits that the proxy clients have produced.

item.name: Number of bytes received from the clients
item.description: The number of bytes received from the clients by the proxy.

item.name: Number of misses
item.description: The number of HTTP misses that the proxy clients have produced.

item.name: Number of bytes delivered to clients
item.description: The number of bytes delivered to clients from the proxy.

item.name: Number of partial (near) hits
item.description: The number of HTTP partial (near) hits that the proxy clients have produced.

item.name: Average rate per second of requests
item.description: The average rate per second of HTTP requests.

item.name: Number of requests received from clients
item.description: The number of HTTP requests received from clients.

item.name: Average time to first response byte for all requests
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average time to first response byte for all hits
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average time to first response byte for all misses
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average time to first response byte for all partial (near) hits
item.description: The average time to first response byte for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all requests 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all requests 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all requests 60
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all hits 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all hits 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all hits 60
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all misses 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all misses 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all misses 60
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all partial (near) hits 1
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all partial (near) hits 5
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Median service time for all partial (near) hits 60
item.description: The median service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average response size for all responses
item.description: The average response size for all HTTP responses, in bytes.

item.name: Average response size for all hits
item.description: The average response size for all HTTP hits, in bytes.

item.name: Average response size for all misses
item.description: The average response size for all HTTP misses, in bytes.

item.name: Average response size for all partial hits
item.description: The average response size for all HTTP partial hits, in bytes.

item.name: Total number of connections with remote servers
item.description: The total number of HTTP connections with remote servers.

item.name: Number of active connections with remote servers
item.description: The number of active HTTP connections with remote servers.

item.name: Number of idle connections with remote servers
item.description: The number of idle HTTP connections with remote servers.

item.name: Number of errors while fetching objects
item.description: The number of HTTP errors while fetching objects.

item.name: Number of bytes received by the proxy from remote servers
item.description: The number of bytes received by the proxy from remote servers.

item.name: Number of bytes transmitted
item.description: The number of bytes transmitted by the proxy to remote servers.

item.name: Number of requests
item.description: The number of HTTP requests that the proxy has issued.

item.name: Average service time for all requests
item.description: The average service time for all HTTP requests, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average service time for all hits
item.description: The average service time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average service time for all misses
item.description: The average service time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Average service time for all partial (near) hits
item.description: The average service time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Total fetch time for all responses
item.description: The total fetch time for all HTTP responses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Total fetch time for all hits
item.description: The total fetch time for all HTTP hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Total fetch time for all misses
item.description: The total fetch time for all HTTP misses, in milliseconds.

item.name: Total fetch time for all partial (near) hits
item.description: The total fetch time for all HTTP partial (near) hits, in milliseconds.

item.name: Memory available
item.description: The total memory available for use by the proxy.

item.name: Memory used for object caching
item.description: The memory used by the proxy for object caching.

item.name: Proportion of memory used
item.description: The proportion of memory used in total by the proxy, as a percentage of the total memory available.

item.name: Memory used for system and support processes
item.description: The memory used by the proxy for system and support processes.

item.name: Number of objects currently held
item.description: The number of objects currently held by the proxy.

item.name: Hardware serial number
item.description: Hardware serial number of the proxy appliance.

item.name: Name of the proxy software
item.description: Name of the proxy software.

item.name: Quantity of storage in use
item.description: The quantity of storage in use by the proxy.

item.name: Version of the proxy software
item.description: Version of the proxy software.

trigger.name: Processor load is too high on {HOST.NAME}

trigger.expression: {Template App BlueCoat SG:deviceDiskStatus1.last()}<>1 or {Template App BlueCoat SG:deviceDiskStatus2.last()}<>1
trigger.name: The agent disk is not operational

value_map.name: BlueCoat SG Operational Status Of The Disk
